mapper.select: select festival_id, festival_place ,festival_start_date ,festival_end_date ,festival_content ,festival_phonenum ,festival_site ,festival_road_name_addr ,festival_lotnum_addr ,festival_lat ,festival_long from festival data order by festival_id desc
